EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Meetup: Spring Cloud Data Flow, Microservices and Microbrews
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Pivotal Boston is hosting a special Spring meetup on St. Patrick’s Day at our new Cambridge location in Kendall Square—the heart of technology leadership, entrepreneurship, education, and innovative research in Boston.
Join us for a microbrew, a tour of our new space, networking with your peers from the Spring community, and a talk on Streaming and Batch Processing in the Cloud with Data Microservices, led by Mark Fisher <[[https://www.twitter.com/m_f_]]>, Senior Engineer of Pivotal’s Spring Cloud team and author of Spring Integration in Action. Space is limited so register today <[[http://pivotal.io/event/spring-cloud-data-flow/boston]]>.
Event Details: Thursday March 17, 6:00–9:00 pm. Pivotal Boston 145 Broadway, Third Floor Cambridge, MA
Schedule: 6:00–6:45pm Registration and networking 6:45–7:45pm Mark Fisher’s Talk 7:45–8:15pm Q&A 8:15–9:00pm Networking
We look forward to having you joining us.
Kindly RSVP <[[http://pivotal.io/event/spring-cloud-data-flow/boston]]> as space is limited for this special event.
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us at events@pivotal.io <[[mailto:events@pivotal.io]]>.
